message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable meeting you at $105. I'm willing to compromise, though! I'd be happy to sell the product to you for $115.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $115 and $95, so I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a bit more profit. I'll sell the product to you for $110, and that's my final offer.
